name: Omegle: Minimal theme
description: A minimal but pretty theme for Omegle text chats.
additional_info:
- Hides ads, headers, and other distractions
- Hides all functionality related to video chat, 'adult' chat, and social networking
- Improves styling of tag editor
- Improves styling of chat controls
- Improves styling of chat log

Might work best with OS X, not sure.
